name: Honours Prototype
description:
This is my Honours dissertation prototype from 2015. My dissertation focused on emergence and how players are able to create stories through gameplay, even if there aren't any stories scripted or present in the game itself.

Please let me know if the Mac version doesn't work, I'm exporting it from Windows and haven't been able to test this version.

If you'd like to find out more about my research, feel free to tweet me/send me an ask on Tumblr!
